stimulusHtml: Suppose that Angolaâ€™s economy is booming, resulting in an increase in the income of domestic residents. How will the increase in income most likely affect Angolan net exports and the foreign exchange value of the Angolan currency, the kwanza?
choicesHtml: Net exports will increase and the kwanza will appreciate.
Net exports will decrease and the kwanza will appreciate.
Net exports will increase and the kwanza will depreciate.
Net exports will decrease and the kwanza will depreciate.
Net exports will not change and the kwanza will depreciate.
